DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this clinical trial is to investigate and compare the effect of piezoelectric surgery on tissue, cellular and molecular level of oral surgical wound healing and postoperative outcomes (pain, swelling, trismus) after lower third molar surgery in healthy patients
DOC.brief_title: Piezoelectric Vibrations and Tissue, Cellular and Molecular Mechanisms of Oral Wound Healing After Third Molar Surgery
DOC.criteria: bilaterally symmetrically impacted lower third molars presence of intraoral infection chronic orofacial pain pregnancy/ lactation heavy tobacco smokers alcohol/ drug abuse allergic reaction to medicaments used
